snippet.title: Faire Trade - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
In Faire Trade, players can build and grow a small shop from humble beginnings into the lifeblood of a vibrant fantasy community. Design your store and stock it with whimsical wares to grab the attention of quirky locals and curious travelers, then forge lasting relationships with repeat customers to see sales boom and uncover more about the mysterious lands and its peculiar denizens.

Wishlist Faire Trade now on Steam!

Links
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2526560/Faire_Trade
Discord: https://discord.gg/winkeltje
Website: https://sassybot.com/fairetrade
